tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ParentalContactPreferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  preferred_contact_method VARCHAR(20),
  last_contact_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ParentalContactPreferences (
	parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	parent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	parent_email VARCHAR(50),
	parent_phone VARCHAR(15),
	preferred_communication_method VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationLog (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	parent_id INT,
	communication_date DATE,
	communication_method VARCHAR(20),
	communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ParentalContactPreferences (
    parent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    preferred_contact_method VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationPreferences (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_id INT REFERENCES ParentalContactPreferences(parent_id),
    communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    delivery_channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ParentalContactPreferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  sms_opt_in BOOLEAN
);
